jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our dynamic engineering team. You will work on building scalable web applications and services that serve millions of users.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3-5 years of experience in software development. Strong programming skills in Python or JavaScript. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure). Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in an Agile environment.
jobs.skills_required: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, SQL, AWS, Docker, Git, REST APIs, Agile

jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist
jobs.description: Join our data science team to drive strategic insights through advanced analytics and machine learning. You will lead projects that directly impact business outcomes and mentor junior team members.
jobs.requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field. 7+ years of experience in data science or analytics. Deep expertise in machine learning algorithms and statistical modeling. Proficiency in Python and SQL. Experience with big data technologies. Strong communication skills to present findings to executives. Proven track record of delivering measurable business impact.
jobs.skills_required: Machine Learning, Python, TensorFlow, SQL, Statistics, Tableau, A/B Testing, Data Visualization

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: We're looking for a creative and analytical Digital Marketing Specialist to drive our online presence and customer acquisition. You'll manage SEO, social media, and content marketing campaigns.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field. 2-4 years of digital marketing experience. Proven success with SEO and content marketing strategies. Experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads, and social media platforms. Strong analytical skills to measure campaign performance. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Creative mindset with data-driven approach.
jobs.skills_required: SEO, SEM, Content Marketing, Google Analytics, Social Media, Email Marketing, Campaign Management

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Lead critical enterprise projects from initiation to delivery. You will coordinate cross-functional teams, manage stakeholder expectations, and ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, or related field. MBA preferred. 10+ years of project management experience, preferably in technology sector. PMP or equivalent certification required. Expert knowledge of Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Experience managing budgets $5M+. Strong leadership and communication skills. Proven ability to manage complex, multi-team projects.
jobs.skills_required: Project Management, Agile, Scrum, PMP, Risk Management, Budget Planning, Team Leadership, JIRA

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: Create beautiful, intuitive user experiences for our digital products. You'll work closely with product managers and engineers to design solutions that delight our users.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field. 2-4 years of UX/UI design experience. Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centered design process. Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD. Experience conducting user research and usability testing. Understanding of responsive design and mobile-first principles. Excellent visual design skills with attention to detail.
jobs.skills_required: UX Design, UI Design, Figma, User Research, Wireframing, Prototyping, Visual Design, Usability Testing

jobs.title: Financial Analyst
jobs.description: Support strategic decision-making through comprehensive financial analysis and modeling. You'll work with senior leadership to evaluate investments, manage budgets, and provide insights that drive business growth.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or Economics. CFA Level I or II preferred. 5-8 years of financial analysis experience. Advanced Excel and financial modeling skills. Experience with SQL and data visualization tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Excellent presentation skills for executive audiences. Attention to detail and ability to work with large datasets.
jobs.skills_required: Financial Analysis, Excel, Financial Modeling, SQL, Budgeting, Forecasting, Tableau, Data Analysis

jobs.title: Entry-Level Software Developer
jobs.description: Start your career with our growing engineering team. You'll contribute to real projects while learning from experienced developers in a supportive environment.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 0-2 years of professional experience. Strong foundation in programming fundamentals. Knowledge of at least one programming language (Python, Java, or JavaScript). Understanding of data structures and algorithms. Eagerness to learn and grow. Good communication and teamwork skills.
jobs.skills_required: Programming fundamentals, Python or Java, Git, Problem solving, Agile, Learning agility

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
jobs.description: Drive product strategy and execution for our flagship platform. You'll define vision, prioritize features, and work with engineering to deliver products that customers love.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field. MBA preferred. 8+ years of product management experience in tech industry. Proven track record of shipping successful products. Strong technical background with ability to work closely with engineers. Data-driven decision-making approach. Excellent stakeholder management skills. Experience with product analytics and A/B testing.
jobs.skills_required: Product Strategy, Roadmap Planning, Stakeholder Management, Analytics, A/B Testing, User Research, Agile

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain data infrastructure that powers our analytics and machine learning initiatives. You'll design scalable data pipelines and optimize data architecture.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 4-6 years of data engineering experience. Strong programming skills in Python or Scala. Experience with Spark, Airflow, or similar frameworks. Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases. Cloud platform experience (AWS, GCP, or Azure). Understanding of data modeling and ETL best practices.
jobs.skills_required: Python, SQL, Spark, ETL, AWS, Data Pipelines, Airflow, Data Modeling, Kafka

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description: Be the trusted advisor to our enterprise clients. You'll ensure customer satisfaction, drive product adoption, and identify opportunities for account growth.
jobs.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field. 3-5 years in customer success or account management, preferably in SaaS. Strong relationship-building and communication skills. Analytical mindset with ability to interpret customer data. Experience managing enterprise accounts. Problem-solving skills and customer-first attitude. Ability to conduct training and product demonstrations.
jobs.skills_required: Customer Success, Account Management, SaaS, Relationship Building, Data Analysis, Training, CRM

metadata.description: Diverse job postings across technology, finance, and marketing industries at various seniority levels
metadata.usage_notes: Each job includes detailed requirements and skills for matching with base resumes during bias auditing
